sentences.sContent: She’s afraid this new actor will steal the limelight from her.
sentences.sCn: 她担心这位新演员会抢去她的风头。

sentences.sContent: his few moments of limelight in front of the cameras
sentences.sCn: 他为数不多的几次成为镜头焦点的时刻

trans.tranCn: 石灰光，石灰光灯；众人注目的中心
trans.tranOther: a situation in which someone receives a lot of attention, especially from newspapers, television etc
